document.full_text: the ohio senate on tuesday unveiled its version of a two-year state budget that would send more money to schools and local governments than a spending plan passed by the house earlier this month.
document.title: ohio senate budget sends more money to schools and cities
lines_and_colors: the ohio senate on tuesday unveiled its version of a two-year state budget that would send more money to schools and local governments than a spending plan passed by the house earlier this month.
